crosshair.tip: Drag the cursor to select the cropping area

exit.description: After exiting, the images not exported will no longer be exported.
exit.title: Exit Plugin?

dropZone.tip: Drag and drop files here for search

error.convertError: Image conversion failed, possibly due to the high resolution of the image, resulting in insufficient graphics card memory. Please try using an image with a lower resolution for the conversion. If this issue persists, consider using a dedicated graphics card with more memory to run this plugin.
error.fileExtensionNotSupported: This file format is not supported. Supported formats include: jpg, jpeg, png, webp, avif.
error.fileSizeNotSupported: File size not supported, the maximum supported size is currently 50MB
error.imageLoadError: Unable to load image. Please ensure the image file exists and has the appropriate read/write permissions. If the issue persists, try opening the image in another software to further investigate.
error.invalidGpuDevice: The graphics card of the current device does not support running this AI model. This issue may be caused by an outdated graphics card or abnormal driver version. It is recommended to use a graphics card produced after 2019 for better performance.
error.resolutionNotSupported: Image exceeds the maximum size limit, currently supporting a maximum pixel size of 65535

exit.description: Exiting will stop the task. Images with unfinished format conversion will no longer be processed.
exit.title: Exit Plugin?

restart-tasks.description: Do you want to rerun the completed tasks with the new settings?
restart-tasks.title: Rerun Task

success.description: Successfully converted {{ count }} files. You can select other images in Eagle to continue the conversion.
success.title: Conversion Complete!

empty.content: Please add images from Eagle. You can add multiple images.
empty.title: Add Images

iGPUWarning.description: AI technologies require substantial hardware capabilities. If your device lacks a dedicated graphics card, image generation can be extremely slow or might not work at all.
iGPUWarning.title: Hardware Requirements

status.processing: HD Conversion in progress, please wait...

downloading.description: Downloading and installing the training AI model, please wait.
downloading.title: Downloading and Installing...

failed.description: Unable to download the AI model link, possibly due to the current network environment not being accessible. Please try switching to another network connection and try again. (Ensure that you can open this link: https://r2-plugin.eagle.cool/test.png)
failed.title: AI Model Download Failed

initialize.description: It will take approximately 15~20 seconds
initialize.title: Initializing AI Model

prepare.description: To ensure smooth operation of the plugin, it is necessary to download and install the pre-trained AI model.
prepare.title: Download and Install AI Model

success.description: The pre-trained AI model has been successfully downloaded and installed. Now you can start using the plugin and enjoy its powerful features.
success.title: AI Model Installed Successfully!
